title: Artful Play: Art with a Beat
description:
>Take a musical journey through the museum. Look closely, tap your toes, and sing along while exploring art and music together in the galleries. This workshop is designed for children ages 3–5 with one or more accompanying adults. Price for the workshop is per person; museum admission or Art Institute membership is also required for participating adults.

A registration form will be sent upon ticket purchase and must be returned to familyprograms@artic.edu prior to the program.

>This program is currently at capacity. To be added to the waiting list, please email us at familyprograms@artic.edu with your name and the program that you’re interested in. Although it is not guaranteed, we will contact you upon availability. For more information about family programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or e-mail familyprograms@artic.edu. For upcoming family programs, please visit the family programs calendar.
